snippet: The family of a Catholic priest who was painted by Thomas Eakins is trying to stop the portrait’s sale by the Archdiocese of Philadelphia, saying the church does not own it.
abstract: Family of Msgr Patrick J Garvey, Catholic priest who was once friends with realist painter Thomas Eakins, is trying to block Archdiocese of Philadelphia from auctioning a valuable portrait by the artist; Archdiocese claims painting was given to church decades ago, and that its sale is necessary to boost dwindling finances; family argues that painting was only on loan.
lead_paragraph: The family of a Catholic priest who was painted by Thomas Eakins is trying to stop the portrait’s sale by the Archdiocese of Philadelphia, saying the church does not own it.

headline.main: Family and Church Feud Over an Eakins
headline.print_headline: Family and Church Feud Over an Eakins
